//  divé‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹æ¯æ¬¡å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–
DonEveryChange:Â debounce(functionÂ () {
  varÂ searchStr =Â "";
  varÂ selection =Â getSelection();
  varÂ emtypIndex = [];

  forÂ (letÂ i =Â 0; i < selection.anchorNode.data.length; i++) {
    // æ‹¿å–å½“å‰å…‰æ ‡æ‰€åœ¨è¡Œçš„æ‰€æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ä¸‹æ ‡
    ifÂ (selection.anchorNode.data[i] ==Â " ") {
      emtypIndex.push(i);
    }
  }
  // å¦‚æœå­—ç¬¦å†…æ²¡æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä¼ 
  ifÂ (emtypIndex.lengthÂ ==Â 0) {
    searchStr =Â encodeURI(
      selection.anchorNode.data.slice(0, selection.anchorOffset)
    );
  }Â elseÂ {
    ifÂ (/(?<=\|\s)[\w\(\)-_]+/.test(selection.anchorNode.data)) {
      // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ ç®¡é“ç¬¦+ç©ºæ ¼ å•è¯çš„å½¢å¼ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªç©ºæ ¼åçš„å•è¯ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼ˆ| stats countï¼‰ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶éœ€è¦statsã€‚
      searchStr =
        selection.anchorNode.data.match(/(?<=\|\s)[\w\(\)-_]+/)[0];
    }Â elseÂ {
      // éƒ½æ²¡æœ‰åˆ™è¯´æ˜æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œindex=ï¼ŒæŠŠç©ºæ ¼å»æ‰å³å¯
      searchStr =Â encodeURI(selection.anchorNode.data.replace(/\s*/g,Â ""));
    }
  }

  sysConfig.syntaxTips({Â context: searchStr }).then((res) =>Â {
    this.showallListÂ = res.data;
    this.showListDetialÂ =Â this.showallList[0] ||Â "";
  });
  this.upDowmIndexÂ =Â 0;
  varÂ lis =Â document.querySelectorAll(".showlis");
  lis.forEach((li) =>Â {
    li.classList.remove("showliActive");
  });
  document.querySelector(".showeditbox").style.displayÂ =Â "flex";
  document.querySelector(".showeditbox").style.borderÂ =Â "1px solid #409eff";
  document.querySelector(".showall").style.borderRightÂ =
    "1px solid #409eff";
}),

javascript
pasteValue(e) {
  e.stopPropagation();
  e.preventDefault();
  varÂ text =Â "",
    event = e.originalEventÂ || e;

  ifÂ (event.clipboardDataÂ && event.clipboardData.getData) {
    text = event.clipboardData.getData("text/plain");
  }Â elseÂ ifÂ (window.clipboardDataÂ &&Â window.clipboardData.getData) {
    text =Â window.clipboardData.getData("Text");
  }

  ifÂ (document.queryCommandSupported("insertText")) {
    document.execCommand("insertText",Â false, text);
  }Â elseÂ {
    document.execCommand("paste",Â false, text);
  }
},

editblur() {

  document.querySelector(".editbox").style.overflowÂ =Â "hidden";
  document.querySelector(".editbox").style.borderÂ =Â "1px solid #409eff";
  document.getElementById("elInput").style.borderÂ =Â "none";
  document.querySelector(".showeditbox").style.borderÂ =Â "none";
  document.querySelector(".showall").style.borderÂ =Â "none";
  varÂ lis =Â document.querySelectorAll(".showlis");
  lis.forEach((li) =>Â {
    li.classList.remove("showliActive");
  });

  // ç§»é™¤å…¨å±€ç»‘å®šçš„ç²˜è´´äº‹ä»¶
  document.removeEventListener("paste",Â this.pasteValue);

  // æ•°ç»„æ¸…ç©º
  this.showListDetialÂ =Â "";
  this.showallListÂ =Â "";
},

javascript
handleKeyUpEvent(event) {
  switchÂ (event.code) {
    caseÂ "ArrowDown":
      this.handleKeyDown();
      break;
    caseÂ "ArrowUp":
      this.handleKeyUp();
      break;
  }
},
